item.title: CVE-2024-0242|2024-02-08T19:34:14.895Z -- Qolsys, Inc. -- IQ Panel 4
item.description: Under certain circumstances IQ Panel4 and IQ4 Hub panel software prior to version 4.4.2 could allow unauthorized access to settings.
